players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Diana. Charlie: remained silent."
Diana: "Thanks Charlie, I'll be cautious. Stay alert everyone."
You: "Charlie, watch out. I'm onto you and will protect the town."
You: "Charlie, stay cautious. Diana, be vigilant."
Charlie: "Bob, keep an eye on Diana. We need to stay cautious."
Diana: "Stay vigilant, Charlie and Bob seem suspicious. We need to work together."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
